data.name: RTK13 - Wang Yuanji Special Blue Striped Outfit 王元姫 ブルーストライプ柄特別衣装
data.detailed_description:
Officer graphics with Wang Yuanji's Special Blue Striped Outfit will be added.

▼To Use
Select "EDIT OFFICER." Under "EDIT HISTORICAL OFFICERS" choose "EDIT FACIAL GRAPHICS" and select Wang Yuanji. The available face graphics will appear. Choose the Wang Yuanji Bonus Officer graphic from the Special edition.
Following this, you will be able to use it in both MAIN and HERO MODES.
data.about_the_game:
Officer graphics with Wang Yuanji's Special Blue Striped Outfit will be added.

▼To Use
Select "EDIT OFFICER." Under "EDIT HISTORICAL OFFICERS" choose "EDIT FACIAL GRAPHICS" and select Wang Yuanji. The available face graphics will appear. Choose the Wang Yuanji Bonus Officer graphic from the Special edition.
Following this, you will be able to use it in both MAIN and HERO MODES.
data.short_description: Officer graphics with Wang Yuanji's Special Blue Striped Outfit will be added.

fullgame.name: ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIII / 三國志13

data.supported_languages:
Japanese*, Traditional Chinese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 10, Windows® 8, Windows® 8.1, Windows® 7, Windows® Vista
  • Processor: Pentium®4 1.6GHz or over
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024×768 over or 1280×720 over display
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 48KHz WAVE file can be played
  • Additional Notes: Shader model: Version 3.0, VRAM: 256MB over
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 10, Windows® 8, Windows® 8.1, Windows® 7, Windows® Vista
  • Processor: Core2 Duo 2.0GHz or over
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024×768 over or 1280×720 over display
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 48KHz WAVE file can be played
  • Additional Notes: Shader model: Version 3.0, VRAM: 512MB over
